医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现医院咖啡机不负责传播超级细菌《英国医学杂志》圣诞节期发表的一项研究发现，医护人员知道医院的咖啡机不会传播疾病，而且似乎没有必要全面禁止，这将让他们感到欣慰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Hospital-coffee-machines-not-responsible-for-spreading-superbugs-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Hospital-coffee-machines-not-responsible-for-spreading-superbugs-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7967de51-b5c9-4d7a-9ba5-6eba87b43bbb Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:56:47 -0500 Hospital coffee machines not responsible for spreading superbugs, study finds
节日食品和健康益处：纽卡斯尔大学专家研究圣诞晚餐主食不到一周的时间，全国各地的家庭将坐下来享用传统的圣诞晚餐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Festive-food-and-health-benefits-Newcastle-University-experts-examine-Christmas-dinner-staples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Festive-food-and-health-benefits-Newcastle-University-experts-examine-Christmas-dinner-staples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30fbf80a-4609-4356-b526-ab6f72ac5c71 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:51:10 -0500 Festive food and health benefits: Newcastle University experts examine Christmas dinner staples
患有严重心理困扰的成年人大麻使用量的增加与精神科护理的增加有关研究调查了 2009 年至 2019 年美国患有严重心理困扰 (SPD) 的成年人吸食大麻的增长趋势，揭示了与精神病住院和门诊心理健康护理增加之间的显着联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Rising-cannabis-use-among-adults-with-severe-psychological-distress-linked-to-increased-psychiatric-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Rising-cannabis-use-among-adults-with-severe-psychological-distress-linked-to-increased-psychiatric-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2cc6528-a0a4-4edb-9ad2-cc55d4f86049 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:50:00 -0500 Rising cannabis use among adults with severe psychological distress linked to increased psychiatric care
新的《神秘博士》节日活动与英国较低的死亡率相关《英国医学杂志》圣诞期发表的一项研究发现，在节日期间（尤其是圣诞节）播放的新《神秘博士》剧集与英国接下来一年的死亡率较低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/New-Doctor-Who-festive-episodes- Associated-with-lower-UK-death-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/New-Doctor-Who-festive-episodes- Associated-with-lower-UK-death-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a74d9ce0-10bf-4893-b1d1-27ceed885775 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:17:09 -0500 New 'Doctor Who' festive episodes associated with lower UK death rates
数字算法 ePOCT+ 成功减少儿童抗生素处方，对抗抗菌药物耐药性研究展示了 ePOCT+ 数字算法如何有效指导医疗保健提供者为儿童开抗生素处方，显着减少不必要的抗生素使用，并在不影响患者治疗结果的情况下解决抗菌素耐药性问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Digital-algorithm-ePOCT2b-successively-reduces-antibiotic-prescriptions-in-children-combating-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Digital-algorithm-ePOCT2b-successively-reduces-antibiotic-prescriptions-in-children-combating-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3382da84-c631-412c-9e7d-536c28639071 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:17:00 -0500 Digital algorithm ePOCT+ successfully reduces antibiotic prescriptions in children, combating antimicrobial resistance
常见的心脏药物会导致阿尔茨海默氏症血液检测出现假阳性哥德堡大学的研究人员与格拉斯哥大学的同事合作，提出了数据表明，常用于治疗心力衰竭的药物 Entresto（sacubitril/valsartan）可导致血浆 Aβ 比率显着降低，血浆 Aβ 比率是一种候选血液。阿尔茨海默病（AD）测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Common-heart-medication-causes-false-positives-on-Alzheimers-blood-test.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Common-heart-medication-causes-false-positives-on-Alzheimers-blood-test.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86d858e7-a7db-4212-b39f-fb2016013477 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:11:47 -0500 Common heart medication causes false positives on Alzheimer's blood test
麻省大学阿默斯特分校的研究人员开发出新策略来智胜抗生素耐药性“超级细菌”抗生素耐药性“超级细菌”无法杀死它们，这是一场紧迫的公共卫生危机，根据疾病控制中心的数据，每年发生超过 280 万例抗生素耐药性感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/UMass-Amherst-researchers-develop-novel-strategy-to-outsmart-antibiotic-pressive-e28098superbugse28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/UMass-Amherst-researchers-develop-novel-strategy-to-outsmart-antibiotic-pressive-e28098superbugse28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e0c03d3-2485-48cb-8443-3b61cb3492e6 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:06:47 -0500 UMass Amherst researchers develop novel strategy to outsmart antibiotic-resistant ‘superbugs’
肉桂提取物有望通过抑制脂肪细胞生长和促进脂肪分解来减少肥胖研究表明，肉桂提取物可显着抑制脂肪细胞分化和脂质积累，通过减少细胞模型和小鼠的脂肪产生和增强脂肪分解，从而提供对抗肥胖的潜在益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Cinnamon-extract-shows-promise-in-reducing-obesity-by-inhibiting-fat-cell-growth-and-boosting-fat-breakdown.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Cinnamon-extract-shows-promise-in-reducing-obesity-by-inhibiting-fat-cell-growth-and-boosting-fat-breakdown.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c48ad0c6-ccda-41cd-b4b3-164837e93802 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:06:00 -0500 Cinnamon extract shows promise in reducing obesity by inhibiting fat cell growth and boosting fat breakdown
新研究挑战阿片类药物治疗癌痛的“金标准”研究人员检查了阿片类药物治疗癌症引起的疼痛的数据，发现这些药物对癌症疼痛的真正益处的证据存在巨大差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/New-study-challenges-gold-standard-opioid-treatment-for-cancer-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/New-study-challenges-gold-standard-opioid-treatment-for-cancer-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ca8e266-c0a5-4535-a698-324fdd1c0c6a Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:55:11 -0500 New study challenges "gold standard" opioid treatment for cancer pain
事实证明，艺术和创造力干预对于增强老年人的健康和福祉具有成本效益BMC 公共卫生研究评估了老年人艺术和创造力干预措施 (ACI) 的成本效益，揭示了其对健康和福祉的积极影响，重点是经济评估和显着投资回报的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Arts-and-creativity-interventions-prove-cost-efficient-for-enhancing-older-adults-health-and-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Arts-and-creativity-interventions-prove-cost-efficient-for-enhancing-older-adults-health-and-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3b7d3b4-c098-4d9f-98d4-71f4fec430bd Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:51:00 -0500 Arts and creativity interventions prove cost-effective for enhancing older adults' health and well-being
